projectGridLines.title: Game development,
projectGridLines.description:
This internship offers an opportunity to work on live games that will enhance your skills in programming, game development, LLD and teamwork.

  1. Brief of project/assignment

             Your Role & Responsibilities

  • Design, build/develop new game features using C# language and Unity game engine.
  • Fix bugs and assist in debugging and optimizing game code to ensure smooth gameplay.
  • Follow engineering best practices to ensure code quality, performance and reliability.
  • Collaborate effectively with the team of artists, game designers, producers and product managers contributing to an innovative environment of technical excellence.
  • Participate in playtesting and brainstorming sessions and contribute ideas to enhance playing experience.

Skill set required

  • Strong problem-solving skills
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills
  • Strong CS fundamentals and OOPs concept
